title: slavic43
author: slavic43
content: Hi,A Crypto recovery access service is asking me to pay them funds (~4500 USD) to buy a "government access token" in order to recover my funds through Trust wallet by " overwriting the blockchain so one can make manual changes to that blockchain. "   Had anyone heard of access tokens and if they are used in such a way?Thank you

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: slavic43 on November 07, 2023, 12:12:31 AMHi,A Crypto recovery access service is asking me to pay them funds (~4500 USD) to buy a "government access token" in order to recover my funds through Trust wallet by " overwriting the blockchain so one can make manual changes to that blockchain. "   Had anyone heard of access tokens and if they are used in such a way?Thank youThey ask you to pay them $4500 with an impossible task? You should be aware that transactions are irreversible and if your funds have been gone by now, there's no way to access and recover them.Government access token?They're joking and don't get fooled.

comments.author: slavic43
comments.body: Thank you, as you might have saved me from losing more money and making a terrible mistake.They were saying it's only available on the Darkweb and the most experienced Crypto traders know about this.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: slavic43 on November 08, 2023, 01:52:48 AMThank you, as you might have saved me from losing more money and making a terrible mistake.Don't mention it. Quote from: slavic43 on November 08, 2023, 01:52:48 AMThey were saying it's only available on the Darkweb and the most experienced Crypto traders know about this. Why it should only be available there? When most of the illegal things are happening there and don't forget that most scams are also there. That's a lot of money that they're trying to suck from their victims and how much was it that you're about to recover on your wallet that seemed t o be gone already because I'm guessing that you've been phished before, right?
